definition: Lepidoptera (insect order including butterflies 蝶類|蝶类 and moths 蛾類|蛾类)

sentences.english: In addition, 124 species from Lepidoptera are newly recorded in Hubei province.
sentences.chinese: 此外，鳞翅目有124种为湖北省新记录种。

sentences.english: The common groups were Lepidoptera and Oligochaeta plesiopora.
sentences.chinese: 常见类群为鳞翅目和近孔寡毛目。

sentences.english: This is the website for The International Lepidoptera Survey.
sentences.chinese: 这是国际鳞翅目昆虫调查的网站。

sentences.english: VIP3 shows activity against many lepidopteran insect larvae.
sentences.chinese: 而VIP3对鳞翅目昆虫具有较广谱的杀虫活性。

sentences.english: The classification of species in Lepidoptera has been controversial and complicate.
sentences.chinese: 目前针对鳞翅目的系统发育关系尚未形成统一的认识。

sentences.english: It can control more than 20 insect pests, mainly caterpillars, he adds.
sentences.chinese: 它能控制20多种害虫，主要是鳞翅目昆虫的幼虫。

sentences.english: The usual bipyramid-shaped parasporal bodies occur in Lepidoptera -active strains.
sentences.chinese: 一般双金字塔形伴胞体形成于鳞翅目活性株。

definition: Hemiptera (suborder of order Homoptera, insects including cicadas and aphids)
Hymenoptera (insect order including ants and bees)
Homoptera (insect suborder including cicadas, aphids, plant-hoppers, shield bugs etc)
Orthoptera (insect order including grasshoppers, crickets and locusts)
Odonata, order consisting of about 6,000 species of dragonflies and damselflies
scaly wing/Lepidoptera (insect order including butterflies 蝶類|蝶类 and moths 蛾類|蛾类)
